thread.title: Stressed Out by Work? Worried About Nuclear War? Try the ‘Healing’ Olympics

author: Eun-Young Jeong
title: Stressed Out by Work? Worried About Nuclear War? Try the ‘Healing’ Olympics
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—South Koreans have reason to be stressed. They work long hours. Every once in a while, they’re reminded of North Korea in their backyard. People can use a little calm.
That might explain the fake sheep on the road to the 2018 Winter Olympics.
The faux flock, whose members are holding signs that say HAPPY700, is meant... RELATED VIDEO Pyeongchang Winter Olympics: A Drone's View Pyeongchang, a tiny ski resort in a remote corner of South Korea, has transformed itself into the host of the largest-ever Winter Olympics. Here’s how the Games look from a drone’s perspective. To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
